snippet: President José Mujica and his cabinet signed long-awaited rules for Uruguay’s legal marijuana marketplace on Tuesday.
abstract: Pres Jose Mujica and his cabinet sign long-awaited rules for Uruguay's legal marijuana marketplace, in which citizens 18 or older may cultivate up to six plants per household, or join a small marijuana growing club.
lead_paragraph: President José Mujica and his cabinet signed long-awaited rules for Uruguay’s legal marijuana marketplace on Tuesday.

headline.main: Uruguay: Government Sets Rules for Legal Sales of Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Uruguay: Government Sets Rules for Legal Sales of Marijuana
